@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This interface should be used in all objects managing a set of items
implementing {@link qx.ui.form.IModel}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Tries to set the selection using the given array containing the
representative models for the selectables.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array of the selected models.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Array} An array containing the models of the currently selected
items.
@return.description:
An array containing the models of the currently selected
items.
